settings.heading: iPhone, iPad and MacBook Mounts
settings.copy: RAM® Mounts offers a wide range of mounting solutions for your iPhone, iPad, iPod, and MacBook. With everything from form-fitting cradles to the popular RAM® X-Grip®, securing your device wherever you need it has never been easier. The versatility of RAM® systems allow you to efficiently move your device between your boat, car, desk, motorcycle, and much more. With IntelliSkin® and GDS® Technology™, protect your iPad from drops and rugged use with standardized GDS® charging pins. Compatible with a variety of GDS® vehicle docks and accessories. Explore the full line of Apple device mounts below.

settings.heading: iPhone Mounts
settings.copy: Take your iPhone almost anywhere with RAM® mounting solutions. Choose from a wide selection of bases to attach your iPhone to your car, boat, bike, motorcycle, and much more. All RAM® iPhone holders – including the popular RAM® X-Grip®, RAM® Quick-Grip™, and form-fit holders – provide access to your device’s ports and buttons.

settings.heading: iPad Mounts
settings.copy: RAM® provides robust mounting solutions to secure your iPad in the most demanding applications. Find mounts that fit your iPad no matter what generation of the device you own—including the new iPad mini 6. Position your iPad to the ideal position with the RAM® X-Grip®, RAM® Tab-Tite™, RAM® Tab-Lock™, and form-fit holders.

settings.heading: MagSafe Mounts
settings.copy: Compatible with iPhone 14, iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 12, and iPhone 12 Pro models is the RAM® Ball Adapter for Apple MagSafe Charger. Take your MagSafe charger in-vehicle by popping it into the RAM® Ball Adapter and pairing with any B size mounting components. Take advantage of the MagSafe's magnetic features by keeping your phone mounted in place while simultaneously charging.

settings.heading: iPad mini 6 Holders and Mounts
settings.copy: The release of the new iPad mini 6 has airplane and helicopter pilots alike itching to get their hands on the new tablet's amazing features. By default, RAM® Mounts has plenty of mounting solutions to go along with the new iPad mini 6. Between the form-fitting RAM® EZ-Roll'r™ Cradle and the universal options available, the countless mounting configurations you can use to customize your iPad mini 6 mount will certainly scratch the itch.

settings.heading: IntelliSkin® with GDS®
settings.copy: Designed for Apple iPad devices, IntelliSkin® is a protective sleeve featuring GDS® Technology™ and military-grade drop protection. The integrated GDS® connector molded directly into the skin and the ruggedized docking contacts on the skin's exterior both protect your iPad's charging port. This helps to extend the life of your iPad as well as making IntelliSkin® compatible with an ecosystem of GDS® Docks and accessories.
